def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x, y, z in permutations(config):
            check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_y_right = is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_light = is_light(y, ctx)
            check_z_left = is_left(z, x, ctx)
            check_z_smaller_x = is_smaller(z, x, ctx)
            check_z_grey = is_grey(z, ctx)
            check_x_middle = is_middle(x, [y, z], ctx)
            if (
                check_x_large
                and check_x_dark
                and check_y_right
                and check_y_smaller_x
                and check_y_light
                and check_z_left
                and check_z_smaller_x
                and check_z_grey
                and check_x_middle
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x, y, z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
